Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: No two people on earth are alike, and it's got to be that way in music or it isn't music

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: I never had a chance to play with dolls like other kids. I started working when I was six years old

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate straight singing. I have to change a tune to my own way of doing it. That's all I know

Quote.Author: Billie Holiday
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't have friends, then I ain't got nothing

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: Champions keep playing until they get it right

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: Be bold. If you're going to make an error, make a doozy, and don't be afraid to hit the ball

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: The main thing is to care. Care very hard, even if it is only a game you are playing

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: Sports are a microcosm of society

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: A girl didn't get an athletic scholarship until the fall of 1972 for the very first time

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: I always liked co-ed events best so we have two men and two women on each team

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: I like entrepreneurial people; I like people who take risks

Quote.Author: Billie Jean King
Quote.QuoteValue: I like putting money back into what made my life, and tennis has been great to me

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with being a loser, it just depends on how good you are at it

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: No one's really happy anyway, it's not human

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Music - that's been my education. There's not a day that goes by that I take it for granted

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have children, you don't want to have drugs and drinks in the house. It's just not good

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to live in an ivory tower, being the songwriter who just turns inward

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Our passion is our strength

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Punk is not just the sound, the music. Punk is a lifestyle

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Moshing and broken glass just don't go together

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: People are so damned afraid that one day they might wake up and discover that they've grown old

Quote.Author: Billie Joe Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very monogamous

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Did your mother never tell you not to drink on an empty head?

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is a wonderful invention: then again, so is a bicycle repair kit

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Los Angeles. It reinvents itself every two days

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two seasons in Scotland: June and Winter

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: If Jesus was a Jew, how come he has a Mexican first name?

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents used to take me to the pet department and tell me it was a zoo

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame is being asked to sign your autograph on the back of a cigarette packet

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why I should have to learn Algebra... I'm never likely to go there

Quote.Author: Billy Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people don't know that wrestling came out of the circus

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: If I worried about appearances, I wouldn't be at Cubs games

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to get back to a level of social responsibility that we haven't seen for a long time

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a house of no love or emotion - it kind of sticks with you

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Saturn Return is just the return of your planets to their original position

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Injuries are nothing to be ashamed about

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: I had such a big mouth for so long that it doesn't faze anybody anymore

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was part of a generation that changed the world, and it was taken over by posers

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: We've turned into a whining society

Quote.Author: Billy Corgan
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock in the mainstream culture has lost a lot of its mojo

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to go on just living and laughing and loving

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: At 60, I could do the same things I could do at 30, if I could only remember what those things are

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about jazz: it's free flowing, it comes from your soul

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: To be good, you need to believe in what you're doing

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't be funny if my feet don't feel right

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: Gentlemen, start your egos

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is such hard work

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: Women need a reason to have sex. Men just need a place

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: My granddaughter's birth has made me want to create things she will love

Quote.Author: Billy Crystal
Quote.QuoteValue: From the first time I saw Sid Caesar be funny I knew that's what I had to do

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely prefer being a lover than a fighter

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are not doing what you love, you are wasting your time

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people are satisfied with the junk food being sold as music

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather laugh with the sinners than cry with the saints - the sinners are much more fun

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to give people a reason to hate my guts more? I'm making more money

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a deep-seated paranoia that Americans have about not being Americans or something

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: My songs are like my kids

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians want to be the loud voice for so many quiet hearts

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: More than art, more than literature, music is universally accessible

Quote.Author: Billy Joel
Quote.QuoteValue: Like family, we are tied to each other. This is what all good musicians understand

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I love beautiful wood

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Hi, Billy Mays here for

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm up against a wall, that's when Billy Mays performs best

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Before you throw it away, let Mighty Mendit save the day

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: My voice, my likeness is my livelihood. That's it. I keep it simple. I pick good products

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take on a product unless I believe in it. I use everything that I sell

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy what I do. I think it shows

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's a pitch, then you buy

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: The best things in life are free - and $19.95

Quote.Author: Billy Mays
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important for me to sell a product that works

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: Hell is the highest reward that the devil can offer you for being a servant of his

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is wrong side up. It needs to be turned upside down in order to be right side up

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: They tell me a revival is only temporary; so is a bath, but it does you good

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: More men fail through lack of purpose than lack of talent

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: Whiskey is all right in its place - but its place is hell

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing in the world of art like the songs mother used to sing

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: Some persons think that they have to look like a hedgehog to be pious

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: When the English language gets in my way, I walk over it

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is no hell, a good many preachers are obtaining money under false pretenses

Quote.Author: Billy Sunday
Quote.QuoteValue: What have you given the world it never possessed before you came?

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to tell people the truth, be funny or they'll kill you

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: We are on the track of something absolutely mediocre

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: The best director is the one you don't see

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: He has Van Gogh's ear for music

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood didn't kill Marilyn Monroe, it's the Marilyn Monroes who are killing Hollywood

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Hindsight is always twenty-twenty

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Shoot a few scenes out of focus. I want to win the foreign film award

Quote.Author: Billy Wilder
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is working with Jack Lemmon

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm nothing without wildlife. They are the stars. I feel awkward without them

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I really think I like poisonous snakes

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I can count on my mum and brother to be there for me through good and bad times

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I make people step over the ant trail

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me a 15-ft. crocodile any day over a bee

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I love having my birthday at Australia Zoo

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I love them very much. All animals big and small. You can name an ant for instance

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to be doing exactly what I'm doing now - teaching people about animals

Quote.Author: Bindi Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want Daddy's passion to ever end. I want to help endangered wildlife just like he did

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd done three solo albums in a row, and that's quite narcissistic

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I get obsessed by little nerdy things in my corner that no one else is interested in

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every year brings unknowns that you have to deal with and handle, confront and embrace

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a fountain of blood. In the shape of a girl

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I'm quite used to not being understood rather than being understood

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no map to human behaviour

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always asking me about eskimos, but there are no eskimos in Iceland

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason I do interviews is because I'm protecting my songs

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: People that complete other people's vision are understated

Quote.Author: Bjork
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is our chapel

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody in the Washington regulatory bureaucracy gets fired for saying no

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: In an urban area, you're not going to be an hour away from another post office

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually enjoy having the Capitol view. We started referring to it as the trillion dollar view

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Texan - my idea of gun control is hitting what you aim at and nothing else

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Those people' is a bad word

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: I see our veterans as American heroes, not as cartoon characters

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a quad copter on my Christmas list, as I suspect quite a few people do

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been through several of his campaigns, and I can tell you nobody can out-campaign Rick Perry

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody likes to make a hard decision, because you're running every two years

Quote.Author: Blake Farenthold
Quote.QuoteValue: Every member of Congress has highways in their district

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: All I need is my Chanel dress, my Louboutins, and some red lipstick

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being at home and cooking and baking

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been a big fan of gossip. Being a victim of it, I knew how much it hurt

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a night owl

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody on our cast is very musically talented, except for me

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't believe we're being paid to live in New York

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: In high school, there are so many cliques. You're never safe

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole family's been in the business. My whole family is crazy

Quote.Author: Blake Lively
Quote.QuoteValue: It's difficult to wear such high Louboutins and also freestyle rap

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like bubble baths

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: There needs to be an app that edits what I say versus what I want to say

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: My life has been an open book, for better or for worse

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: Shoot, man, I love everybody! I don't have time to hate

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, what makes an artist is a unique personality that they're not afraid to let show

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that smart, but I'm smart enough to know that if Usher wants to help you, you let him

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my band - they are the best out there, and I wouldn't want to perform with anyone else

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent a lifetime in love with country music

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: The wussiest thing a guy can do is drive a clean truck. Dents, scratches and mud - that's manly

Quote.Author: Blake Shelton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're in the public eye, people are going to take shots at you

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: A dead end can never be a one way street; you can always turn around and take another road

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Never expect people to treat you any better than you treat yourself

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Faked enthusiasm is worse than bad acting - it is bad acting with the intent to deceive

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Visualization is daydreaming with a purpose

Quote.Author: Bo Bennett
Quote.QuoteValue: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate to blow my own horn, but I gave a lot of people fits

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: As a 9th grader, I competed with the high school kids and out of 600 people, I finished 10th

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Back before I injured my hip, I thought going to the gym was for wimps

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, I really never imagined myself being a professional athlete

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a firm believer in if you can't get it the old fashioned way, you don't need it

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I miss anything about the sport, it's the camaraderie of old teammates

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have four years to complete your college education, do it

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: In baseball, I was a pitcher, which I hated because there was no action there

Quote.Author: Bo Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Really, it's not harder to train for them because once baseball starts you play everyday almost

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance - waiting for the bathroom

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel old. I don't feel anything till noon. That's when it's time for my nap

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: I do benefits for all religions - I'd hate to blow the hereafter on a technicality

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: She said she was approaching forty, and I couldn't help wondering from what direction

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: Middle age is when your age starts to show around your middle

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: You never get tired unless you stop and take time for it

Quote.Author: Bob Hope
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart and soul of the company is creativity and innovation

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: The riskiest thing we can do is just maintain the status quo

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't like to follow pessimists

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: What I've really learned over time is that optimism is a very, very important part of leadership

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: I get up at 4:30 in the morning, seven days a week, no matter where I am in the world

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: I ride a bike and use aerobic equipment twice a week, and work out with a trainer, lifting weights

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to sound too critical, but we're taking a wait-and-see approach on UltraViolet

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: I started off wanting very much to be a newscaster

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: I began as a weatherman and I learned very quickly I wasn't very good at it

Quote.Author: Bob Iger
Quote.QuoteValue: Keeping it simple for the consumer is incredibly dire

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: This stammer got me a home in Beverly Hills, and I'm not about to screw with it now

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The acting is better when you know your material is being judged

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I was influenced by every comedian I ever saw work. That's the only way you learn how to do it

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's a part, just a part of comedians, that is still childlike

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: All comedians are, in a way, anarchists. Our job is to make fun of the existing world

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to survive is to have a sense of humour

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't live in the past. There's no point. You can't change anything. What a waste of time

Quote.Author: Bob Newhart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had time off, and it drove me nuts. I was crawling up the wall

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: I had slumps that lasted into the winter

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew when my career was over. In 1965 my baseball card came out with no picture

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: In 1962 I was named Minor League Player of the Year. It was my second season in the bigs

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: I set records that will never be equaled. In fact, I hope 90% of them don't even get printed

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: Sporting goods companies pay me not to endorse their products

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: When I looked at the third base coach, he turned his back on me

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: How do you catch a knuckleball? You wait until it stops rolling, then go pick it up

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: After getting out of the service and going into baseball I never wanted to do anything else

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: I was acting when I was playing baseball

Quote.Author: Bob Uecker
Quote.QuoteValue: Where would I be without baseball? Who am I without baseball?

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the moment when I break a man's ego

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to see the U.S. wiped out. Death to the U.S

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: All that matters on the chessboard is good moves

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate ready-made suits, button-down collars, and sports shirts

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to look like a bum

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: All I want to do, ever, is play chess

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am boring. I am boring!

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in hero worship

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself to be a genius who happens to play chess

Quote.Author: Bobby Fischer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in psychology

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: A grill is just a source of heat. Just like a stove, it is very user-friendly

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: Grilling outside with my parents at the Jersey shore. We would grill lobster and corn in the summer

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: Grilling takes the formality out of entertaining. Everyone wants to get involved

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't chase everybody on the Internet who's saying stuff about you, that's for sure

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the culture of grilling. It creates an atmosphere that is festive but casual

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: When people pile seven things onto one burger, it drives me nuts!

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't be on the cheeseburger diet all the time

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I fell into cooking

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: My feeling is that if you can cook, I can teach you how to do television

Quote.Author: Bobby Flay
Quote.QuoteValue: I work out to eat

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing better than a good, blind referee

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I know all about cheating. I've had six very successful marriages

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a legend in this sport. If you don't believe me, ask me

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's the downtown area of Tupelo. Did you see the skyscrapers? Two stories

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: North Dakota State. What do you have to do there to graduate? Milk a cow with your left hand?

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to be popular in Barcelona. That sounds like a fun job

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend in need is a pest

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: You can win, it'll just cost you some money

Quote.Author: Bobby Heenan
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd have a good voice, if it ever came out of your throat

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to wait until the next morning to regret something I did that was kinda dumb

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking has been ridiculous in college basketball the past 15 years

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: Mental toughness is to physical as four is to one

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people have the will to win, few have the will to prepare to win

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us learn to write in the second grade. Most of us go on to greater things

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't intend to retire

Quote.Author: Bobby Knight
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an unemployed teacher right now and I'm looking for a place to teach

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: The true musician is to bring light into people's hearts

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to use the audience as my color palette, my instrument

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a time when being a musician and learning to be a musician was actually very wonderful

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest musical influences are probably my parents

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want anything to get in the way of me and my singing. I want my mind as clear as possible

Quote.Author: Bobby McFerrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to write a book of poetry, as well as children's stories
